author: tn
msg: [EMAIL-141] Added support for content-id mapping in MimeMessageParser. Thanks to Stephen Kruger.

author: pmouawad
msg: Removed some deprecated note on using Java 1.5 for timeouts

author: fadams
msg: Implement better handling of contentType including adding a mechanism to serialise and deserialise native JavaScript Objects as JSON as an alternative to using the AMQP type system. The contentType handling also transparently converts text MIME types to String on the received message

author: bodewig
msg: don't repeat information already present on the project's security page
